sec.title: An embedded Ancestral Recombination Graph
sec.p: An ancestral recombination graph 1 2 3 of a sampled population is embedded in any outcome of any haploid lineage process. We formally show the exact embedding using the gARG formalism 4.
This genetic legacy is the genetic material that survives in the sample population S S originally copied from ancestral haploid h h (with or without mutations).
